top_recommendations: Review verb forms and their correct usage in sentences.
Focus on the correct use of articles in English.

practical_recommendations.title: Wrong Word
practical_recommendations.guidance: Pick the most precise word and avoid awkward or redundant phrasing.
practical_recommendations.why: 12 cases (25% of all grammar issues). This lowers precision and can sound unnatural.

examples.error: Upload a transcript after
examples.correction: Upload a transcript after that

examples.error: I realized and I found that
examples.correction: I realized that only

practical_recommendations.title: Verb Form
practical_recommendations.guidance: Use the correct verb form and ensure subject-verb agreement and modal usage.
practical_recommendations.why: 10 cases (21% of all grammar issues). This makes grammar sound inconsistent and less natural.

examples.error: works good enough
examples.correction: works well enough

examples.error: what we have here simple functionality
examples.correction: what we have here is simple functionality

practical_recommendations.title: Prepositions
practical_recommendations.guidance: Choose the correct preposition for common phrases and verbs.
practical_recommendations.why: 8 cases (17% of all grammar issues). This changes meaning in key phrases and verb patterns.

examples.correction: model can become frustrated at this moment

examples.error: I use assembly to transcribation to transcribe
examples.correction: I use assembly for transcription to transcribe

practical_recommendations.title: Articles
practical_recommendations.guidance: Use a/an/the (or zero article) correctly before nouns.
practical_recommendations.why: 8 cases (35% of all grammar issues). This reduces grammatical accuracy in noun phrases.

examples.error: the my screen
examples.correction: my screen

examples.error: architecture of project
examples.correction: architecture of the project
